data.quote: Aim for simplicity in Data Science. Real creativity won’t make things more complex. Instead, it will simplify them.
data.author: Damian Duffy Mingle

data.quote: If you can't understand a study, the problem is with the study, not with you.
data.author: Seth Stephens-Davidowitz

data.quote: Failing to include the perspective of women is a huge driver of unintended male bias that attempts (often in good faith) to pass itself off as 'gender neutral'.
data.author: Caroline Criado-Pérez

data.quote: In Data Science if you want to help individuals, be empathetic and ask questions; that way, you can begin to understand their journey, too.
data.author: Damian Mingle

data.quote: Data Scientists should refuse to be denied by someone else's vision of what's possible.
data.author: Damian Mingle
